item.title: Pestle
item.description: Client: Pestle | Pharmacy Compliance System Services: Software Development Year: 2015-2016 Link: www.rxpestle.com Pestleâ„¢ provides an easy to use web-based system designed to keep pharmacies aligned with the USP quality standards. The software integrates accreditation tested standard operating procedures and associated documentation, compliance management, task organization and a depot for historical data storage for large or small compounding pharmacy practices.
